roleset.name: pay back
roleset.note: REIMBURSE-V NOTES: Note that args 1/3 are reversed from what they were in 'pay'. This is tenuous because the trace doesn't need to be linked to themoney; it could be a targetless agent trace. In general it seems likearg1 and args2/3 are mutually exclusive, depending on thegrammaticality of the following: (from reimburse.01-v)

example.name: payment
example.text: ...and $2.8 million in overhead costs that *trace*-1 won't be reimbursed *trace*-1.

example.name: payee and in-exchange-for
example.text: Gulf Power had set up an elaborate payment system through which it reimbursed outside vendors -- primarily three Florida advertising agencies -- for making illegal political contributions on its behalf.
example.arg: outside vendors -- primarily three Florida advertising agencies --
for making illegal political contributions on its behalf

example.name: tenuous example with args 1-2-3
example.text: Douglas R. Pappas of Myerson& Kuhn says [about $5.3 million of the award]-1 goes directly to the USFL *trace*-1 to reimburse it for fees already paid.
